title: Data Scientist
description: Looking for a data scientist proficient in Python, scikit-learn, SQL, and machine learning model deployment. Knowledge of NLP and model evaluation is a plus.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Experience in TensorFlow, PyTorch, and building scalable ML pipelines. Strong understanding of deep learning and model optimization techniques.

title: AI Researcher
description: PhD or MSc in AI-related field. Research in transformers, LLMs, GANs, and deep reinforcement learning. Publication track record is desirable.

title: Backend Developer
description: Expert in Node.js, Express, MongoDB, REST APIs, and JWT authentication. Familiarity with microservices architecture and Docker is essential.

title: Data Analyst
description: Strong Excel and Power BI skills. Able to analyze large datasets, create dashboards, and present business insights effectively.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Develop NLP models using spaCy, NLTK, and Hugging Face. Should understand BERT, sentiment analysis, topic modeling, and embeddings.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Experience with CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS/GCP, monitoring tools. Scripting in Bash or Python is required.

title: Cloud Data Engineer
description: Skilled in BigQuery, AWS S3, Spark, and data warehousing. Build ETL pipelines and ensure high-performance data processing.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Proficient in React.js, Node.js, MongoDB, and RESTful APIs. Able to build scalable frontend-backend integrated systems.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Experience with OpenCV, image segmentation, object detection, CNNs, and deploying vision models on edge devices.
